```{r}
pv <- list(param = expand.grid(a = 1:3, b = 4:6))

.func <- function (param, value) {
    if (param$a == 1) {
       stop('Deliberate failure')
    }
    
    list(foo = param$a)
}

result <- pv_call(.func, pv)
```
